definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to kill and burn (idiom); murder and arson
to lend sb a knife to kill sb/to get sb else to do one's dirty work/to attack using the strength of another (idiom)
to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
lit. to kill people like scything flax (idiom)/fig. to kill people like flies
It's all exaggeration, you don't need to take it seriously/a fuss about nothing/nothing to write home about
pinyin: sha1 ren2 bu4 guo4 tou2 dian3 di4

definition: to kill sb for a trifle
see 過失致死罪|过失致死罪[guo4 shi1 zhi4 si3 zui4]

sentences.english: He was a murderer whose hands reeked with blood.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个双手沾满鲜血的杀人犯。

sentences.english: You also understand that people murder for money or power ?
sentences.chinese: 你也知道人们为了金钱或者权利杀人吗？

sentences.english: International human-rights lawyers say these types of killings would likely constitute a war crime.
sentences.chinese: 国际人权律师说，这种杀人行为可能会构成犯罪。

sentences.english: The bad news - 90% of people admit that they would kill someone.
sentences.chinese: 坏消息是，90%的人都承认他们会杀人。

sentences.english: A charlatan murders without a knife.
The revenger of blood himself shall slay the murderer: when he meeteth him, he shall slay him.
sentences.chinese: 报血仇的必亲自杀那故杀人的，一遇见就杀他。

sentences.english: She drove him on to commit murder.
He was charged with murder but found innocent later.
sentences.chinese: 他被控杀人，但后来发现他是无罪的。

sentences.english: News came that the murderer had given himself up.
sentences.chinese: 有消息说，杀人犯已经投案自首了。
他是一个穷凶极恶的杀人犯。

sentences.english: If I fell under the sword of that murderer.
sentences.chinese: 如果我倒在这个杀人魔王的剑下。

sentences.english: He could kill and then sit down and eat.
sentences.chinese: 杀人后他仍面不改容立刻坐下吃喝。

sentences.english: At present, the suspicion of intentional homicide, Chen has been approved by the prosecution to arrest.
sentences.chinese: 目前，因涉嫌故意杀人罪，陈某已被检方批准逮捕。

sentences.english: Ill air slays sooner than the sword.
sentences.chinese: 污浊的空气杀人比刀还快。

sentences.english: Alcohol consumption is linked to both higher homicide rates and more vehicle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 酒精消耗和杀人案件及交通事故增多都有联系。

sentences.english: The murderer will stay in pris'on for good .
sentences.chinese: 那个杀人犯将永远呆在监狱里。

definition: to kill and burn (idiom); murder and arson
violent crime/to commit a violent act (assault or murder)
to kill sb to prevent them from divulging a secret/to silence sb
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to assassinate/(military) to fight with a bayonet/(baseball) to put out (a baserunner)
to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
